description: Developed clean, efficient, and maintainable user interfaces using vanilla JavaScript and modular Sass for internal tools and platform infrastructure.
Maintained and incrementally modernized legacy codebases, introducing improved patterns and tooling while preserving system stability.
Built reusable UI components and styling utilities to support multiple internal projects with shared requirements.
Set up reproducible local development environments using Vagrant, significantly reducing onboarding time and environment-related issues for new developers.
